item.title: @elonmusk: You cannot spend decades treating a group as a collective â€œproblemâ€ and then act shocked when its me...
item.description: You cannot spend decades treating a group as a collective â€œproblemâ€ and then act shocked when its members begin to think in collective terms. The Left has consistently attacked the European roots of America, broadly labeling it â€œWhite culture,â€ while critiquing American institutions, history, and traditions as â€œWhite supremacyâ€ and â€œprivilege.â€ Yet they simultaneously celebrate and fund the group interests of their preferred racial and ethnic blocs. Congress openly organizes broad caucuses for Black, Hispanic, and Asian interests, but any advocacy for the group that laid Americaâ€™s foundation is treated as uniquely illegitimate. This game is rigged. They strategically demand the break down of White identity into small sub-groups while they organize theirs into political monoliths. Itâ€™s heads they win, tails you lose.
